resource_url.title: Organization URL
resource_url.description: URL to the CRM system located in the Dynamics 365 cloud. Usually in format https://<organization>.crm.dynamics.com.

api_version.title: API Version
api_version.description: The API version, which will be used to query the data. For a list of available versions, please, refer to Microsoft's Web API documentation.

endpoint.title: Endpoint
endpoint.description: The entity, which will be queried against. For a list of available entities, please, refer to entity documentation. For a list of custom entities, please refer to component documentation.

query.title: Query (advanced)
query.description:
A Microsoft Web API query, which will be sent along with the request. All pieces of query can be separated by new-line or "&".
Please, refer to this article explaining how to use the querying language.

incremental.title: Incremental Load to Storage
incremental.description: If true, all tables will be loaded to storage incrementally.
